name: last train (Carolina Araújo, Calamity, Daniel Lopes, Franciscorp, DankCat, DampSquib, SundroMusic)
name_original: last train (Carolina Araújo, Calamity, Daniel Lopes, Franciscorp, DankCat, DampSquib, SundroMusic)
description:
Every track leads to the same destination, in the end.

Accompany a man on their journey to reach the final place they must get to and learn through your interactions with the strange spirits in this land what really happened to get you stuck in this place.

Be careful, though. There's a celestial being following you with its unwavering gaze...

Features
  • Made in 40 hours for the Game Jam "TUA Jam".
  • Explore a suspenseful, atmospheric setting located in purgatory, with original assets modelled for this purpose.
  • Understand the story behind what happened to get the player into this situation, through interaction with NPCs and viewing original artwork in the form of in-world cutscenes.
  • Avoid the otherworldly yet scary enemy that follows you around...
Team
  • Carolina Araújo (Programmer and Otter Moral Support)
  • Francisco Pinto (Programmer, UI and Commit Farmer)
  • Pedro Valério (Programmer and Just Kinda There)
  • Leonardo Catalano (Modelling and ChainSmoker)
  • Daniel Lopes (Modelling, Tech Artist and Water Blender)
  • "Calamity" Costa (Concept art, Game Art and Nap Taking)
  • "Sundro" (Soundtrack and Special Sound Effects)
